text: Vaughan Raymond Brown was born 3 November, 1959 in Christchurch. He is a former cricketer who played 2 tests and 3 one-day internationals for New Zealand in the 1980s. ==Other websites== * "Vaughan Brown's Test wicket" by Brydon Coverdale at Cricinfo Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Christchurch
title: Vaughan Brown
